doc.previous: Stallman has received recognition for his work including  Along with his native English Stallman is also fluent enough in French and Spanish to deliver his two hour speeches in those languages and claims a somewhat flawed command of Indonesian 113 114 He has never married although often advertises semi humorously for a companion 94
